subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With a 98-78 victory over the SuperSonics last night, the Spurs improved to 7-0 on the road and are the only unbeaten road team left in the N.B.A.
snippet: With a 98-78 victory over the SuperSonics last night, the Spurs improved to 7-0 on the road and are the only unbeaten road team left in the N.B.A.
